Pre-Game Insights: Georgia are unbeaten at home in four outings across competitions.
Greece face a tougher challenge this time considering what's at stake.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Georgia have lost their last four home games with Greece across competitions.
Greece won the UEFA European Championship in 2004.
Georgia have won thrice, drawn once and lost once in their last five home games.
Others: Georgia will be hosting Greece at the Boris Paichadze Dinamo Arena in UEFA Euro 2024 qualifying on Tuesday (March 26).
Georgia finished fourth in Group A and failed to earn a direct qualification but advanced to the playoffs via the Nations League.
Georgia have recovered from a frustrating losing streak, winning thrice in five games.
